name: KinetaBlock
description:
KinetaBlock is a puzzle platformer in which you play as a block. Early on, you sadly realize that you cannot jump. Use your surroundings and physics to help propel you upwards and towards the end of the level.

Features:
- Simple, pleasing graphics
- Original soundtrack
- Intuitive, easy to understand controls
- Fun character movement
- 10 levels, with more to come*
- Level Editor (beta)**

* If you would like to suggest ideas and content, please contact us. We would love to hear ideas from you to make this game better.

** The level editor is a work in progress. Many features have not yet been implemented, and that the editor will have further development.
